title: Snapdeal offered up to 60% off on Apple iPhones, Samsung Galaxy, HTC and other smartphones in ‘Preview Monday Sale’
text:
Other Articles Supreme Court to hear Castleton MAT dispute on Wednesday NMDC expects demand for iron-ore to increase in second-half of this fiscal Quikr Empowers Common Man Across India with QuikrJobs Snapdeal offered ‘Preview Monday Sale’ on Monday where the ecommerce giant offered around 60% discount on smartphones like Apple iPhones, Micromax Canvas Spark, Samsung Galaxy among others; big discounts on electronic items like Lenovo Notebook laptop, Google Chromecast, Voltas AC, Canon DSLR are available apart from other deals on a wide range of home appliances and apparels – the sale will last just for 1 day.
This Snapdeal sale was a preview of the coming festive season, including Diwali, says company. The ecommerce brand had planned to attract customers with hourly deals.
Speaking to Financial Express , Kunal Bahl, co-founder & CEO, Snapdeal, said “We are going to go bigger on festive sales this year than the previous one. It’s like Diwali never ended for us!”
Read: Snapdeal sales jump 10 times on ‘Preview Monday’
Snapdeal had also come up with cash-back offer for SBI Debit/Credit cards and FreeCharge users.
Apart from discounts, Snapdeal had also aimed at faster deliveries and easy refund services like 90 minutes reverse pick-up service and money refund within an hour.
Here are some of the top deals Snapdeal had offered:
1) 59% off on Apple iPhone 4S
2) 40% off on Microsoft Lumia 535
3) Philips’ neckband over-ear headphones priced at Rs 249
4) 20% off on Lenovo Notebook
5) 30% off on HTC desire smartphone
6) Micromax Canvas Spark gets 31% discount at Rs 4,999
